entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle late this evening then 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 6 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
